to be irrational: to be tight, to be astute
to be tight, to be barely enough
to be dry and hard, to be tight, to be rigid
to be innocent, to be naive
to be gentle, to be light
to be chilly, to be lonely, to be awkward
to be lonely, to be dreary
to feel regretful, to be regretful
to feel the lack of, to feel sad
to be clumsy, to be half asleep
to be dizzy, to be chaotic, to be disorganized
to be serious, to be solemn
to be pale, to be light, to be faint
to be humorous, to be ludicrous, to be laughable
to be easygoing, to be smooth, to be amicable
